event.description: Curtis Granderson flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Placido Polanco flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Clete Thomas singles on a ground ball to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Miguel Cabrera pops out to second baseman Luis Valbuena.
Magglio Ordonez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Brandon Inge strikes out swinging.
Ryan Raburn grounds into a double play, shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera to second baseman Luis Valbuena to first baseman Victor Martinez. Magglio Ordonez out at 2nd.
Adam Everett singles on a ground ball to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Dane Sardinha strikes out swinging.
Curtis Granderson flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Placido Polanco doubles (13) on a line drive to left fielder Ben Francisco. Adam Everett to 3rd.
Clete Thomas flies out to left fielder Ben Francisco.
Miguel Cabrera grounds out, third baseman Mark DeRosa to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Magglio Ordonez walks.
Brandon Inge singles on a ground ball to shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera. Magglio Ordonez to 2nd.
Ryan Raburn flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo. Magglio Ordonez to 3rd.
Adam Everett grounds into a force out, shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera to second baseman Luis Valbuena. Brandon Inge out at 2nd.
Dane Sardinha flies out to left fielder Ben Francisco.
Curtis Granderson strikes out swinging.
Placido Polanco flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Clete Thomas grounds out, second baseman Luis Valbuena to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Miguel Cabrera singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ben Francisco.
Magglio Ordonez called out on strikes and Miguel Cabrera caught stealing 2nd, catcher Kelly Shoppach to second baseman Luis Valbuena.
Brandon Inge flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Ryan Raburn grounds out, shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Adam Everett flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Dane Sardinha called out on strikes.
Curtis Granderson walks.
With Placido Polanco batting, Curtis Granderson steals (4) 2nd base.
Placido Polanco grounds out, shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez. Curtis Granderson to 3rd.
Clete Thomas singles on a ground ball to second baseman Luis Valbuena. Curtis Granderson scores.
Miguel Cabrera grounds out, first baseman Victor Martinez to pitcher Cliff Lee.
Pitching Change: Rafael Betancourt replaces Cliff Lee.
Magglio Ordonez flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Brandon Inge strikes out swinging.
Ryan Raburn pops out to shortstop Asdrubal Cabrera.
Grady Sizemore strikes out swinging.
Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Raburn. Asdrubal Cabrera out at 2nd, left fielder Ryan Raburn to second baseman Placido Polanco.
Victor Martinez lines out to second baseman Placido Polanco.
Shin-Soo Choo flies out to left fielder Ryan Raburn.
Mark DeRosa strikes out on a foul tip.
David Dellucci strikes out swinging, catcher Dane Sardinha to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Ben Francisco called out on strikes.
Luis Valbuena walks.
Kelly Shoppach strikes out swinging.
Grady Sizemore flies out to right fielder Clete Thomas.
Asdrubal Cabrera grounds out, first baseman Miguel Cabrera to pitcher Justin Verlander.
Victor Martinez strikes out swinging.
Shin-Soo Choo grounds out, shortstop Adam Everett to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Mark DeRosa lines out to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
David Dellucci grounds out, second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Ben Francisco lines out to left fielder Ryan Raburn.
Luis Valbuena strikes out swinging.
Kelly Shoppach called out on strikes.
Grady Sizemore flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Asdrubal Cabrera strikes out swinging.
Victor Martinez doubles (10) on a fly ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Shin-Soo Choo lines into a double play, shortstop Adam Everett to second baseman Placido Polanco. Victor Martinez doubled off 2nd.
Mark DeRosa strikes out swinging.
David Dellucci grounds out, second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Ben Francisco pops out to second baseman Placido Polanco.
Luis Valbuena walks.
Kelly Shoppach ground bunts into a force out, pitcher Justin Verlander to shortstop Adam Everett. Luis Valbuena out at 2nd. Kelly Shoppach to 1st.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Josh Barfield replaces Kelly Shoppach.
Grady Sizemore flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Asdrubal Cabrera strikes out swinging.
